sentences.spanish: Comimos mucho pescado fresco y tomamos helado.
sentences.english: We ate a lot of fresh fish and had ice cream.

sentences.spanish: Un día, fuimos de excursión a una montaña.
sentences.english: One day, we went on a hike to a mountain.

sentences.spanish: Vimos unas vistas increíbles desde la cima.
sentences.english: We saw incredible views from the top.

sentences.spanish: Por la noche, la luna brilló sobre el agua.
sentences.english: At night, the moon shone over the water.

sentences.spanish: Todos disfrutamos mucho de ese viaje.
sentences.english: Everyone enjoyed that trip very much.

sentences.spanish: El próximo año, yo estudiaré en la universidad.
sentences.english: Next year, I will study at the university.

sentences.spanish: Aprenderé sobre historia y literatura.
sentences.english: I will learn about history and literature.

sentences.spanish: Mis amigos y yo viviremos en un apartamento cerca del campus.
sentences.english: My friends and I will live in an apartment near campus.

sentences.spanish: Cocinaré mucho y haremos fiestas pequeñas.
sentences.english: I will cook a lot and we will have small parties.

sentences.spanish: Después de graduarme, viajaré por el mundo.
sentences.english: After graduating, I will travel the world.

sentences.spanish: Visitaré muchos países y conoceré gente nueva.
sentences.english: I will visit many countries and meet new people.

sentences.spanish: Espero que mi futuro sea emocionante y lleno de aventuras.
sentences.english: I hope my future will be exciting and full of adventures.

sentences.spanish: Siempre tendré ganas de aprender y explorar.
sentences.english: I will always want to learn and explore.

sentences.spanish: Esta mañana, mi abuela y yo fuimos al mercado.
sentences.english: This morning, my grandmother and I went to the market.

sentences.spanish: Ella quería comprar frutas y verduras frescas.
sentences.english: She wanted to buy fresh fruits and vegetables.

sentences.spanish: Compramos manzanas, plátanos y tomates.
sentences.english: We bought apples, bananas, and tomatoes.

sentences.spanish: También probamos un poco de queso local. ¡Era muy delicioso!
sentences.english: We also tried some local cheese. It was very delicious!

sentences.spanish: Mi abuela siempre sabe dónde encontrar las mejores cosas.
sentences.english: My grandmother always knows where to find the best things.

sentences.spanish: Después, fuimos a una panadería y compramos pan caliente.
sentences.english: Afterwards, we went to a bakery and bought hot bread.

sentences.spanish: Regresamos a casa contentos y con la bolsa llena.
sentences.english: We returned home happy and with a full bag.

sentences.spanish: La tarde la pasamos cocinando juntos.
sentences.english: We spent the afternoon cooking together.

sentences.spanish: De mayor, yo seré un arquitecto.
sentences.english: When I'm older, I will be an architect.

sentences.spanish: Diseñaré edificios altos y casas bonitas.
sentences.english: I will design tall buildings and beautiful houses.

sentences.spanish: Mi amigo Pedro será un médico.
sentences.english: My friend Pedro will be a doctor.

sentences.spanish: Él ayudará a muchas personas en el hospital.
sentences.english: He will help many people in the hospital.

sentences.spanish: Nosotros haremos el mundo un lugar mejor.
sentences.english: We will make the world a better place.

sentences.spanish: Mi hermana quiere ser una maestra de escuela.
sentences.english: My sister wants to be a school teacher.

sentences.spanish: Ella enseñará a los niños a leer y escribir.
sentences.english: She will teach children to read and write.

sentences.spanish: Nuestros padres estarán orgullosos de nosotros.
sentences.english: Our parents will be proud of us.
